posts.postText:
First come first serve.
Add me on steam.
Lemme know what game.

The story:
Spag posted first but I added him on steam first.
The Result?
We both get games cause Nolskeys is such a cool guy.
And the rest of you don't get shit cause you don't constantly monitor the forums in the rare chance of a first-come-first-serve giveaway, like you should.

The Result?
We both get games cause Nolskeys is such a cool guy.
And the rest of you don't get shit cause you don't constantly monitor the forums in the rare chance of a first-come-first-serve giveaway, like you should.

>> Soo..how do we do this.? 
We Give the game to Joster because he gave you guys minecraft accounts.
Ill be giving out moar later on.
